item.title: • Set Photo Download Resolution
item.description:
Overrides global setting until application restarts.
Defines photo size downloaded. If you have a slow internet connection, it's recommended to decrease this setting.
You will only see options your Roku player supports.

item.title: • Set Slideshow Display Method
item.description:
Overrides global setting until application restarts.
Determines how the slideshow displays your photos.

item.title: • Set Slideshow Delay
item.description:
Overrides global setting until application restarts.
Defines the number of seconds between photos during the slideshow.

item.title: • Set Slideshow Order
item.description:
Overrides global setting until application restarts.
Defines the order of the slideshow/video playback. Album order can be customized in the Google Photos web application or mobile app.

item.title: • Set Slideshow Overlay
item.description:
Overrides global setting until application restarts.
Defines if a persistent overlay will show image date and filename during slideshow playback 'Time in History' albums will show an overlay regardless of this setting.

item.title: • Set Video Playback Options
item.description:
Overrides global setting until application restarts.
Defines how videos will behave during playback. Setting to 'Continuous Video Playback' will proceed to next queued video without manual action. Ordering is based on 'Slideshow Order' setting.
